archive_file.description: How to import the files for archiving

props.name: import_method
props.description: How to import the files for archiving

props.name: files
props.description: List of files to include in the archive

props.name: url
props.description: URL of the file to archive

props.name: file
props.description: File to upload and archive

props.name: stored_file_id
props.description: ID of a previously stored file in Activepieces to archive

props.name: filename
props.description: Optional filename for this file within the archive

props.name: output_format
props.description: The archive format to create

props.name: filename
props.description: Choose a filename (including extension) for the archive file

props.name: engine
props.description: Use a specific engine for the archiving

props.name: engine_version
props.description: Use a specific engine version for the archiving

props.name: timeout
props.description: Timeout in seconds after which the task will be cancelled

props.name: wait_for_completion
props.description: Wait for the archive creation to complete before returning

props.name: store_file
props.description: Download and store the created archive in Activepieces

capture_website.description: The URL of the website to capture

props.name: url
props.description: The URL of the website to capture

props.name: output_format
props.description: The target format to convert to

props.name: pages
props.description: Page range (e.g. 1-3) or comma separated list (e.g. 1,2,3) of pages

props.name: zoom
props.description: Zoom level to display the website. Defaults to 1

props.name: page_width
props.description: Page width in cm

props.name: page_height
props.description: Page height in cm

props.name: page_format
props.description: Paper format type when printing a PDF. Overrides page_width and page_height

props.name: page_orientation
props.description: Page orientation for PDF output

props.name: margin_top
props.description: Page top margin in mm

props.name: margin_bottom
props.description: Page bottom margin in mm

props.name: margin_left
props.description: Page left margin in mm

props.name: margin_right
props.description: Page right margin in mm

props.name: print_background
props.description: Render the background of websites

props.name: display_header_footer
props.description: Create a header and a footer with the URL and page numbers

props.name: header_template
props.description: HTML template for the print header with classes: date, title, url, pageNumber, totalPages

props.name: footer_template
props.description: HTML template for the print footer with classes: date, title, url, pageNumber, totalPages

props.name: wait_until
props.description: When to consider navigation finished

props.name: wait_for_element
props.description: CSS selector for element to wait for (e.g. "body" or "#element")

props.name: wait_time
props.description: Additional time in ms to wait after the page load

props.name: css_media_type
props.description: Changes the CSS media type of the page

props.name: filename
props.description: Choose a filename (including extension) for the output file

props.name: engine
props.description: Use a specific engine for the conversion

props.name: engine_version
props.description: Use a specific engine version for the conversion

props.name: timeout
props.description: Timeout in seconds after the task will be cancelled

props.name: wait_for_completion
props.description: Wait for the capture to complete before returning

props.name: store_file
props.description: Download and store the captured file in Activepieces

convert_file.description: Create a basic file conversion task for a single file with desired output format

download_file.description: ID of the CloudConvert task to retrieve

props.name: task_id
props.description: ID of the CloudConvert task to retrieve

props.name: include
props.description: Additional data to include in the response

props.name: store_file
props.description: Download and store the output files in Activepieces

merge_pdf.description: How to import the files for merging

props.name: import_method
props.description: How to import the files for merging

props.name: files
props.description: List of files to merge into a single PDF

props.name: url
props.description: URL of the file to merge

props.name: file
props.description: File to upload and merge

props.name: stored_file_id
props.description: ID of a previously stored file in Activepieces to merge

props.name: filename
props.description: Optional filename for this file within the PDF

props.name: filename
props.description: Choose a filename (including extension) for the output file

props.name: engine
props.description: Use a specific engine for the conversion

props.name: engine_version
props.description: Use a specific engine version for the conversion

props.name: timeout
props.description: Timeout in seconds after which the task will be cancelled

props.name: wait_for_completion
props.description: Wait for the merge to complete before returning

props.name: store_file
props.description: Download and store the merged PDF in Activepieces

optimize_file.description: How to import the file for optimization

props.name: import_method
props.description: How to import the file for optimization

props.name: file
props.description: File to upload and optimize (PDF, PNG, JPG)

props.name: url
props.description: URL of the file to optimize

props.name: stored_file_id
props.description: ID of a previously stored file in Activepieces to optimize

props.name: input_format
props.description: The current format of the file. If not set, the extension of the input file is used

props.name: profile
props.description: Optimization profile for specific target needs

props.name: flatten_signatures
props.description: Flatten visible signatures and keep them as non-editable graphics

props.name: colorspace
props.description: Color space of raster images

props.name: filename
props.description: Choose a filename (including extension) for the output file

props.name: engine
props.description: Use a specific engine for the optimization

props.name: engine_version
props.description: Use a specific engine version for the optimization

props.name: timeout
props.description: Timeout in seconds after which the task will be cancelled

props.name: wait_for_completion
props.description: Wait for the optimization to complete before returning

props.name: store_file
props.description: Download and store the optimized file in Activepieces

job_failed.description: Triggers when a CloudConvert job has failed

job_finished.description: Triggers when a CloudConvert job has been completed

new_job.description: Triggers when a new job has been created
